programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 2 Tigers (13-1, 1-0 SEC) storm into the Moody Center for a match with the Longhorns (11-3, 0-1). Auburn extended its win streak to six in a row by topping Missouri on Jan. 4, while Texas dropped its first SEC contest, 80-60 to Texas A&M.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: A hotly-anticipated SEC showdown sees the No. 6 Volunteers (17-2, 4-2) visit the No. 1 Tigers (17-1, 5-0). Tennessee looks to avenge a 92-84 loss to Auburn from 2023-24. Auburn has won 10 in a row after surviving then-No. 23 Georgia 70-68 on Jan. 18.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: History is made as the No. 1 Tigers visit the No. 2 Crimson Tide. This marks the first time in SEC history that the No. 1 and No. 2 teams will face off in the same game. Alabama has won seven in a row, while Auburn has won 15 of its past 16 overall.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Razorbacks (15-10, 4-8 SEC) mount a challenge against the No. 1 Tigers (23-2, 11-1). Auburn maintained its top-dog status by scoring a 94-85 victory at then-No. 2 Alabama on Feb. 15. Auburn earned an 83-51 verdict at Arkansas last season.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The Rebels (19-8, 8-6 SEC) try to knock off the No. 1 Tigers (25-2, 13-1). Auburn's four-game win streak includes a win in the Iron Bowl of basketball with then-No. 2 Alabama on Feb. 15. Auburn beat Ole Miss for a seventh straight time Feb. 1.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 1 Tigers prepare for the SEC Tournament by taking on the No. 22 Aggies. Texas A&M has dropped two straight at home, to Vanderbilt and Tennessee, to fall to 12-3 at Reed Arena, but is 12-5 against Auburn since joining the SEC in 2012.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 1 Tigers (27-3, 15-2) and the No. 7 Crimson Tide (23-7, 12-5) tune up for the SEC Tournament with one more heavyweight clash. Johni Broome put up 19 points, 14 rebounds and six assists to lead Auburn past Alabama 94-85 on Feb. 15.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 1 Tigers begin their SEC Tournament in the quarterfinals against the No. 8 Rebels. Auburn ended the season with losses to Texas A&M and Alabama. Ole Miss senior Sean Pedulla's 3-pointer with 1.3 seconds left sunk Arkansas in the second round.

programme.title: College Basketball
programme.desc: The No. 1 seed Tigers take on the No. 4 Volunteers in the SEC Tournament semifinals. Tennessee seeks its fourth trip to the title game in eight seasons. Johni Broome double-doubled to help defending champion Auburn beat Tennessee 53-51 on Jan. 25.
